bio: A legendary Manjimutt that, through some sort of mistake, got handsome. His smile's so soothing!

soultimate.name: Handsome Grin
soultimate.description: Allies recover a lot of HP; fainted allies are revived.

skill.effect: The 1st Yo-kai you defeat will become your friend.
skill.name: At First Sight

name: Dandoodle
